languages.text: {n}Слова Маражая кажутся искренними — но это явно его собственная истина. Нечто в лице друкари заставляет вас думать, что есть и иная причина, почему друкари выбрали для своего существования столь неспокойное измерение.{/n}

{n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Слова Маражая кажутся искренними — но это явно его собственная истина. Нечто в лице друкари заставляет вас думать, что есть и иная причина, почему друкари выбрали для своего существования столь неспокойное измерение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai parce sincero, pero está claro que las verdades que dice están sesgadas. Algo en su rostro te hace pensar que hay otro motivo por el que los Drukhari eligen una dimensión tan turbulenta como hogar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai parce sincero, pero está claro que las verdades que dice están sesgadas. Algo en su rostro te hace pensar que hay otro motivo por el que los Drukhari eligen una dimensión tan turbulenta como hogar.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋的语调听起来很诚恳，但很显然，这只是他的一面之词。他脸上的表情让你意识到，黑暗灵族之所以会在如此动荡的空间内安家，肯定还有其他原因。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋的语调听起来很诚恳，但很显然，这只是他的一面之词。他脸上的表情让你意识到，黑暗灵族之会在如此动荡的空间内安家，肯定还有其他原因。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは正直に話しているらしく、その話が真実だというのは明らかだ。だが、その表情には、デュカーリがこのような騒々しい次元を故郷として選んだのには、別の理由があるのではないかと思わせるものがある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは正直に話しているらしく、その話が真実だというのは明らかだ。だが、その表情には、デュカーリがこのような騒々しい次元を故郷として選んだのには、別の理由があるのではないかと思わせるものがある。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Malgré son évidente sincérité, Marazhai explique cet état de fait à l'aune de sa propre conception des siens. Pour autant, quelque chose dans son expression vous laisse penser qu'il y a une autre raison pour laquelle les Drukharis ont élu domicile dans une dimension aussi tumultueuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malgré son évidente sincérité, Marazhai explique cet état de fait à l'aune de sa propre conception des siens. Pour autant, quelque chose dans son expression vous laisse penser qu'il y a une autre raison pour laquelle les Drukharis ont élu domicile dans une dimension aussi tumultueuse.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai klingt aufrichtig, doch es ist offenkundig nur seine eigene Wahrheit, die er da spricht. Irgendwas in seiner Miene lässt dich vermuten, dass es noch einen anderen Grund gibt, warum das Volk der Drukhari eine solch turbulente Dimension zu seiner Heimat auserkoren hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai klingt aufrichtig, doch es ist offenkundig nur seine eigene Wahrheit, die er da spricht. Irgendwas in seiner Miene lässt dich vermuten, dass es noch einen anderen Grund gibt, warum das Volk der Drukhari eine solch turbulente Dimension zu seiner Heimat auserkoren hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın sözleri içten durmakla birlikte, kendi inandığı şeyi söylediği de belli. Yüzündeki ifade, sana Drukharilerin öyle çalkantılı bir boyutu yurt bellemesinin ardında başka bir sebep olduğunu düşündürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai sounds sincere, but it is clearly his truth that he is speaking. Something in his face makes you think there is another reason why the Drukhari race chose such a tumultuous dimension to be their home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai'ın sözleri içten duruyor ama kendi inandığı şeyi söylediği de belli. Yüzündeki ifade, sana Drukharilerin öyle çalkantılı bir boyutu yurt bellemesinin ardında başka bir sebep olduğunu düşündürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
